thread.title: Model Claudia Romani showcases perky posterior in Florida
thread.title_full: Model Claudia Romani showcases perky posterior in Florida | Daily Mail Online

author: Lisa Mcloughlin For Mailonline
title: Model Claudia Romani showcases perky posterior in Florida
text:
She's known for her love of football, having qualified as a referee in 2014.
Now three years later, it appears Claudia Romani, 34, hasn't lost the passion for the sport as she showcased her endless curves in a figure-flaunting AC Milan jersey on Tuesday.
The Italian glamour model wasn't shy showcasing her Mediterranean figure as she slipped into a flesh-flashing thong style bikini that exhibited her perky derriere on Miami beach in Florida.
Scroll down for video
Sport style: It appears Claudia Romani, 34, hasn't lost the passion for the sport as she showcased her endless curves in a figure-flaunting AC Milan jersey on Tuesday
Claudia's choice of swimwear displayed her endless toned pins as she showcased the tie-side bottoms with confidence while her Italian jersey had her name proudly emblazoned across the back.
Soaking up the sun, the brunette beauty was spotted at one point getting down in the sand, rolling around as she allowed the sea breeze to wash over her.
Despite her clear love of the beautiful game, Claundia - who dated Italian footballer-turned-manager Filippo Inzaghi - was seen adopting the beloved sport of her adopted home, American football.
She playfully held onto a red and yellow foam oval shaped ball as she walked along the shoreline and was later seen successfully catching it as she partook in a friendly game on the idyllic beach.
Bottoms up: The Italian glamour model wasn't shy showcasing her Mediterranean figure as she slipped into a flesh-flashing thong style bikini that exhibited her perky derriere on the Miami, Florida beach
Life's a beach: Claudia's choice of swimwear displayed her endless toned pins as she showcased the tie-side bottoms with confidence
Sun worshiper: Claudia wasn't shy is showcasing her curves in the sun
Protecting her peepers from the blinding sun, she donned a pair of oversized sunnies as her long ombre locks cascaded down her shoulders into a tousled style.
Although proud of her curves, Claudia recently called out vile trolls for attacking her all natural physique on Instagram, after pictures of her in a swimsuit were put up on an Italian celebrity website.
Writing a lengthy response, she said: 'Of course women need to be women and criticize... "She is disgusting, crappy, fat all over, how can she live in miami .. how does she find money.. blah blah" now!!!!
'Being in the public eye gets u subject to being judged .. I just think ignorance and rudeness shouldn't be acceptable .. I'm curvy .. not an excuse to be a couch potato as someone says .. more my nature and smth that makes me proud too ... meaning I workout daily, eat a vegetarian diet and on purpose supplement with proteins and occasional carbs not to loose the #booty nor the #boobs ..
Having a ball: Despite her clear love of the beautiful game, Claundia - who dated Italian footballer-turned-manager Filippo Inzaghi - was seen adopting the beloved sport of her adopted home, American football
Giving some shade: Protecting her peepers from the blinding sun, she donned a pair of oversized sunnies as her long ombre locks cascaded down her shoulders into a tousled style
Having her say: Although proud of her curves, Claudia recently called out vile trolls for attacking her all natural physique on Instagram
Standing strong: She decided to stick up for herself after pictures of her in a swimsuit were put up on an Italian celebrity website
'I have had no work done and I have never had one single man in 34 years not appreciating my shape .. which in my mind is a good thing to show insecure women that you don't need to be a size zero nor to be all plastic to be liked..
'Obviously my message doesn't come along .. so whatever .. i stick to my life and the best followers I could ask for !!! #curvy #vegetarian #bigbootygirls #curvy #thickfit #ilikethick #italiangirl #claudiaromani #modellife #modelsarentallsizeO #miamirules'.
Her online rant comes after she revealed she had qualified to be a referee to preside over fixtures in both Serie A and Serie B matches in 2015.
She said in 2014: 'Running around on the pitch with all those players and calling the shots is just an irresistible opportunity.'
Surf's up: She playfully held onto a red and yellow foam oval shaped ball as she walked along the shoreline
A whale of a time! Claudia was later seen successfully catching it as she partook in a friendly game on the idyllic beach
